# Deathless (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* | The Undying Court |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** Once per day, you can perform a greater rebuking against deathless creatures in place of one of your turn undead attempts. The greater rebuking is like a normal rebuking except that the deathless creatures that would be rebuked are commanded instead.

**Deathless Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Detect Undead (Spell)|Detect Undead]]****:** Reveals undead or deathless within 60 ft.

**2** **[[Consecrate (Spell)|Consecrate]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Fills area with positive energy, making undead weaker and deathless stronger.

**3** **[[Halt Deathless (Spell)|Halt Deathless]]****:** Immobilizes deathless for 1 round/level.

**4** **[[Spirit Steed (Spell)|Spirit Steed]]****:** Channels an ancient spirit into your steed, increasing its speed and granting other benefits.

**5** **[[Hallow (Spell)|Hallow]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Designates location as holy.

**6** **[[Create Deathless (Spell)|Create Deathless]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Create undying soldier.

**7** **[[Control Deathless (Spell)|Control Deathless]]****:** Deathless don’t attack you while under your command.

**8** **[[Create Greater Deathless (Spell)|Create Greater Deathless]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Create undying councilor.

**9** **[[Hero's Blade (Spell)|Hero’s Blade]]****:** Channel the spirit of a great hero into a melee weapon.
